parts.text:
{"word":"objective","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"目標、目的","english_definition":"something that you are trying to achieve.","examples":[{"sentence":"Our main objective is to increase sales.","translation":"私たちの主な目標は売上を伸ばすことです。"},{"sentence":"What is the objective of this meeting?","translation":"この会議の目的は何ですか？"},{"sentence":"He achieved his objective of running a marathon.","translation":"彼はマラソンを完走するという目標を達成しました。"}],"collocations":["main objective (主な目標)","primary objective (第一の目標)","set an objective (目標を設定する)","achieve an objective (目標を達成する)","meet an objective (目標を達成する)","strategic objective (戦略的目標)","business objective (事業目標)","learning objective (学習目標)"],"synonyms":["goal","aim","purpose","target","intention","end","ambition"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"客観的な、公平な、偏見のない","english_definition":"not influenced by personal feelings or opinions; based on facts.","examples":[{"sentence":"We need to be objective when making decisions.","translation":"意思決定をする際には客観的である必要があります。"},{"sentence":"The judge must remain objective throughout the trial.","translation":"裁判官は裁判中、客観性を保たなければなりません。"},{"sentence":"He tried to give an objective assessment of the situation.","translation":"彼は状況を客観的に評価しようとしました。"}],"collocations":["objective assessment (客観的な評価)","objective analysis (客観的な分析)","objective evidence (客観的な証拠)","objective criteria (客観的な基準)","objective opinion (客観的な意見)","objective view (客観的な見方)","remain objective (客観的であり続ける)","be objective (客観的である)"],"synonyms":["impartial","unbiased","neutral","fair","unprejudiced","detached","disinterested"],"antonyms":["subjective","biased","prejudiced","partial"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(文法)目的格","english_definition":"(grammar) the case of a noun or pronoun that is the object of a verb or preposition.","examples":[{"sentence":"In the sentence 'He hit me,' 'me' is in the objective case.","translation":"「He hit me（彼は私を殴った）」という文では、「me」は目的格です。"}],"collocations":["objective case (目的格)"],"synonyms":[],"antonyms":["nominative (主格)","subjective (主格)"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「objectivus」（対象に関する、客観的な）に由来し、「objectum」（object：対象物）から派生。もともとは哲学的な意味合いが強く、「主観」に対する「客観」という概念を表す言葉として使われた。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/əbˈdʒɛktɪv/","syllables":"ob-jec-tive"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"objectives","adjective_forms":{"comparative":"more objective","superlative":"most objective"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**objective**」は、名詞としては「目標、目的」、形容詞としては「客観的な」という意味を持つ重要な単語です。

*   **名詞 (目標)**: 達成しようと努力する具体的な目標や目的を指します。ビジネス、教育、個人的な目標など、さまざまな文脈で使用されます。
*   **形容詞 (客観的な)**: 個人的な感情や意見に左右されず、事実に基づいて判断することを意味します。科学、ジャーナリズム、法律などの分野で特に重要視されます。主観的な (subjective) と対になる概念です。
*   **文法用語 (目的格)**: 文法用語としての使用頻度は低いですが、知っておくと役立ちます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ My objective is subjective.","correct":"✓ My objective should be objective.","note":"目標は、主観的な願望ではなく、客観的に達成可能なものであるべきです。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He is very objective with his opinion.","correct":"✓ He has a very objective opinion. / ✓ He is very objective in his assessment.","note":"形容詞のobjectiveは、名詞を修飾するか、be動詞と組み合わせて使います。前置詞withは不適切です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The objective of the book is very good. (意図: 本の内容はとても良い)","correct":"✓ The content of the book is very good. / ✓ The book's objective is very clear.","note":"本の「内容」が良いと言いたい場合は、"content" を使用します。本の「目標」が良いと言いたい場合は、"objective" を使用します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["object (名詞: 物、対象、目的語；動詞: 反対する)","objectivity (名詞: 客観性)","objectively (副詞: 客観的に)"],"idioms_phrases":["objective reality (客観的現実)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B2 (名詞・形容詞ともに)","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B2","text":"「**objective**」は、名詞としては「目標」、形容詞としては「客観的な」という意味を持つ単語です。名詞の「目標」は、達成しようと努力する具体的な目的を指し、「The objective of the project is to increase efficiency.（プロジェクトの目標は効率を上げることです）」のように使います。形容詞の「客観的な」は、個人的な感情や意見に左右されず、事実に基づいて判断することを意味し、「We need to be objective when evaluating the data.（データを評価する際には客観的である必要があります）」のように使います。ビジネスや学術的な文脈でよく使われる単語です。主観的な (subjective) と対になる概念として理解しておくと、より深く理解できます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The company set clear **objectives** for the year.","translation":"会社は今年の明確な目標を設定した。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"目標"},{"sentence":"It is important to remain **objective** when analyzing the results.","translation":"結果を分析する際には客観的であり続けることが重要です。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"客観的な"},{"sentence":"What are the learning **objectives** of this course?","translation":"このコースの学習目標は何ですか？","type":"noun","meaning_category":"目標"},{"sentence":"The report provides an **objective** assessment of the situation.","translation":"その報告書は状況の客観的な評価を提供しています。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"客観的な"},{"sentence":"The pronoun 'him' is in the **objective** case.","translation":"代名詞「him」は目的格です。","type":"noun (grammar)","meaning_category":"目的格"}]}
